articles.description: The owner of Borough is a huge footie fan who has always loved a good pie and turned to gourmet pastry treats when restrictions stopped him serving food indoors
articles.content:
A football-loving Edinburgh chef has turned his taste for gourmet pies into a takeaway service - and they even got a mention in this year's coveted Michelin Guide.
Darren Murray and his wife Aleksan… [+3412 chars]

articles.title: Orianne Cevey auctions off ex-husband Phil Collins' awards - Daily Mail
articles.description: Amid her bitter split from Genesis frontman Phil Collins, Cevey is selling a number of items with Kodner Galleries, including records and music awards of her former husband.
articles.content:
Orianne Cevey is auctioning off her ex-husband Phil Collins' gold records and awards with an asking price of as little as $100.

articles.title: It's A Sin's Callum Scott Howells' heartbreak as grandparents killed by coronavirus - Mirror Online
articles.description: It's A Sin star Callum Scott Howells knows all about losing someone you love to a cruel disease as coronavirus has claimed the lives of his grandparents
articles.content:
Callum Scott Howells has shared his heartbreak after losing his grandparents to coronavirus.
